manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Customize your damage solution Bonding Benefits In One Step There's no reason to toss your existing haircare just to trying Bonding Care. Add Acidic Bonding Concentrate Intensive Treatment prior and experience Redken's Bonding Care Complex for smoother, shinier, stronger and healthier-feeling hair. With each use, hair is fortiifed against future damage. 4 Steps To Stronger Hair Coloring your hair or using heat tools? Your hair bonds may be weak. The 4-step system with Redken's Bonding Care Complex from start to finish. The pH balanced formula keeps hair at it's optimal acidity, while repairing strength and deep conditioning for stronger, shinier, vibrant hair.

What are hair bonds? Bonds help keep the fibers within hair together. Damage over time, causes bonds to become weak creating frizzy, breakage, lack of shine and, overall, unmanageable hair. Bonding Goes Beyond The Cuticle Penetrates the cuticle and reinforces weakened bonds. COMBATS 1 YEAR OF VISIBLE DAMAGE IN 1 USE* *Acidic Bonding Concentrate Intensive Treatment, Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave-In vs. Undamaged Hair Color Fade Protection & More Redken's patent pending Bonding Care Complex helps reinforce weak bonds to provide less breakage, increased resilience, color fade protection and more. Healthy hair starts with strong bonds.

4 Steps to Transform your Hair Experience Redken's Bonding Care Complex formulated with Citric Acid. Redken's system reinforces weakened hair bonds, repairs your hair's strength, and keeps hair color vibrant! 2X STRONGER HAIR** **System of shampoo and conditioner vs. non-conditioning shampoo. Results gathered via a study with an external subcontractor in Aug 2020 to evaluate the anti-breakage/strength integrity of the hair with the system of Acidic Bonding Concentrate Shampoo and Conditioner vs non-conditioning shampoo

Why is an acidic haircare product good for my hair? Healthy hair is acidic with pH levels from 4.5 and 5.5. Every day exposures to common elements like water and chlorine have higher, more alkaline pH levels that cause damage to hair. Acidic products have a lower pH to help re-balance your pH levels. How is Acidic Bonding Concentrate different than other bonding products? Acidic Bonding Concentrate products are made with Citric Acid, which helps strengthen damaged hair. Most bonding products are treatments or in salon services which are more time consuming and an additional step in your regimen. How much of this product should I use? The Acidic Bonding Concentrate System is concentrated, which means you do not need as much as your normal haircare routine. We recommend starting with a dime size amount and increasing from there based on your hair thickness, length and preference. Is the Acidic Bonding Concentrate system suitable for color-treated hair? Yes, the Acidic Bonding Concentrate Intensive Treatment is suitable for color-treated hair. Do you have to use the intensive treatment with Acidic Bonding Concentrate Shampoo and Conditioner? Yes, it's recommended to use the Intensive Treatment with Acidic Bonding Concentrate Shampoo and conditioner as a system. However, the treatment delivers benefits of its own and can be used with another Redken haircare range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was really looking forward to this product and so happy the hype lived up to its standards!Firstly, I have bleached, damaged fairly fine hair. I recently been struggling with it being so dry and ridiculously frizzy.. being bad about using a heat protectant and blow drying, hair would feel flat and oily the next day after washing, frizzy ends etc.This shampoo was INCREDIBLE after the first wash. My scalp has never felt so clean. Followed using an Amika hair mask then the acidic bonding conditioner. In the shower, my hair wasn’t as soft as I thought it was after using, but I braided my hair and let it air dry- smelt wonderful and just felt so refreshed!The next day my hair never felt so great, I’m on day 2 and it’s hydrated and soft! not oily, not frizzy and my natural waves never looked better. The volume even after just using it once so far is incredible.Seen a lot of reviews about bad packaging, but it arrived perfectly and even a day earlier.BUY IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved my damaged dry static hair, awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking like Phyllis Dillar’s frizzed out, uncontrolled static, over processed colored very light blonde hair. I thought it was Ruined till it would grow out. At the salon, a $50 treatment with Keratase products was used to rehydrate, but no help. Totally static, dry, brittle, long strands breaking with a wide tooth detangler comb. I bought this shampoo & conditioner combo, and one time, my hair is SO much better! Soft, no static, lays like stronger and fully hair now. Not greasy or heavy as I imagined an intense treatment might be. Wonderful improvement. Grateful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using for a week now and LOVE the results so far. A bit pricey but I think it might just be worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shampoo is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the shampoo and conditioner. On day one, I used them and no other products. It left my hair feeling greasy and looking greasy. My hair was still very soft and less frizzy than usual, but I didn't like how my hair was clumping together due to whatever oils or whatnot are in these. The conditioner did not make my hair feel soft or detangled like other conditioners do.Day two I used both and ended with my own Pantene Pro-V conditioner to try to get that smoothness back and my hair detangled. It worked but my hair still was greasy looking and clumping together.Day 3 I used only the shampoo and my regular conditioner -- AMAZING. All the benefits of healing my hair, minimizing frizziness, and making my hair super smooth and sleek from the shampoo without the greasy look from the pairing conditioner. My hair used to be a mixture of soft and brittle (past bleaching, but it's been over 2yrs since I've touched my hair), but now is only feeling super soft!I suggest trying the shampoo with your own conditioner first. If the results are to your liking, then don't buy the conditioner. Wasted ~$35 on a bottle of conditioner that I will only use every now and then to fortify the work the shampoo is doing, and that will only be on days I'm not going out in public. Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and is softening my hair
reviews.reviewText: About over a year ago I boxed Demi-dyed my hair and regretted it. I purchased a clarifying shampoo to remove what I could and continued using the clarifying shampoo up until 3 weeks ago- when my stylist told me you're not supposed to use it long term because it dries it out. My hair was dry and falling out a lot but I never thought it was the shampoo because I'm 7 months postpartum and figured it was the postpartum symptoms. However after using this product twice, my hair feels softer and isn't falling out as much! I'm eager to see what long-term effects it has.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How it feels and have it works
reviews.reviewText: I like the texture of the shampoo, and it goes along way. The only problem I had which is probably not important to anyone but it’s very hard for me to hold the size that I have and very hard to get the cap to open so I have to literally remove the whole cap itself but that’s OK because I do like it a lot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can Feel The Product Working, But Not The Best For My Hair Type
reviews.reviewText: Have been using Redken faithfully for almost 20 years, despite their frustrating tendency to constantly update and change their product range. So I purchased the Acidic Bonding shampoo and conditioner pair based on the positive reviews. My hair can often feel dry and brittle from regular blow drying and straightening irons, and while I have heat protect products that help, I figured I'd give this a try to and reduce (or eliminate) those phases damaged hair.I really wanted to like this shampoo and conditioner combo, and to be fair, I can feel it working and doing its job, however my hair is not the thickest to begin with and this left it feeling pin thin. The other issue I (personally) had was that my hair felt heavy and oily, almost greasy. Redken make some great products, but this one personally doesn't suit my hair and it seems like others have enjoyed success with this line. I'm going to go back to using Redken Volume Injection as that worked better, and hopefully find an alternative product to deal with those days when my hair feels dry and damaged.Lastly, for those who care, it smells like passionfruit, which I quite like but may not be to the tastes of others, particularly people who don't like passionfruit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorites!
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo so much! It has made my blonde hair feel so much healthier compared to other shampoos. The price may seem a little high but you really don’t need a ton of it to made it lather so it lasts longer than a cheaper shampoo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Cumple con su función y huele rico
reviews.reviewText: Mi cabello se siente más suave y las puntas se ven mucho más reparadas, no tan dañadas
